title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 219.7 - Severability provision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 219.7 - Severability provision

State Regulations

If any section or portion of a section of this Part or the applicability thereof to any person or circumstance is held invalid by a court, the remainder of this Part, or the applicability of such provisions to other persons or circumstances, shall not be affected thereby. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
219.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
